titles: Satyrs upon the Jesuits written in the year 1679, upon occasion of the plot, together with the Satyr against vertue, and some other pieces by the same hand.
author: Oldham, John, 1653-1683.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
A satyr against vertue -- The passion of Byblis in Ovid's Metamorphosis imitated in English -- A satyr upon a woman, who by her falshood and scorn was the death of my friend.
